name: execution-graph
description: Job/message hierarchy tracking: parent-child relationships, causation chains, and job chaining across scheduling and messaging subsystems

userStories.title: Add CausationId + RootCorrelationId to Messaging
userStories.description: Extend correlation model with CausationId and RootCorrelationId headers. Update MessagingCorrelationScope with new properties. Publishers propagate new headers from scope. ScheduledJobDispatcher sets RootCorrelationId = CorrelationId (job execution is root).
acceptanceCriteria: Begin() accepts causationId and rootCorrelationId optional params
Publishers propagate new headers when scope active
Existing behavior preserved when no scope active
Unit tests for new header propagation

userStories.title: Add ParentJobId + RunCondition to ScheduledJob
userStories.description: Add ParentJobId (Guid?) and RunCondition (JobRunCondition enum) to ScheduledJob. Add ParentExecutionId and RootExecutionId to JobExecution. Create JobRunCondition enum with None, OnParentSuccess, OnParentFailure, OnParentCompletion.
acceptanceCriteria: JobRunCondition enum: None, OnParentSuccess, OnParentFailure, OnParentCompletion
XML docs on all new members

userStories.title: Storage Layer — New Columns + Queries
userStories.description: Add GetChildJobsAsync, GetExecutionTreeAsync, GetJobDepthAsync to IScheduledJobStorage. Implement in PostgreSQL (with migration) and InMemory providers. PostgreSQL: partial indexes on nullable FK columns, recursive CTE for depth.
acceptanceCriteria: GetExecutionTreeAsync(rootExecutionId) returns all executions in tree
GetJobDepthAsync(jobId) uses recursive CTE or iterative query
PostgreSQL migration for new columns + partial indexes
Unit tests for InMemory; integration tests for PostgreSQL

userStories.title: Child Job Triggering Engine
userStories.description: After parent execution completes, query child jobs, evaluate RunCondition, trigger matching children. Propagate ParentExecutionId/RootExecutionId. Enforce depth limit.
acceptanceCriteria: Evaluate RunCondition against parent execution status
Matching children: set NextRunTime = now, create execution with hierarchy IDs
RootExecutionId propagation: inherit from parent or parent becomes root

userStories.title: IScheduledJobManager Extensions
userStories.description: Add ScheduleChildAsync and GetExecutionTreeAsync to IScheduledJobManager. Validate parent exists and depth limit.
acceptanceCriteria: ScheduleChildAsync validates parent exists and depth limit
Unit tests for validation edge cases

userStories.title: Update ScheduledTrigger with Hierarchy Data
userStories.description: Populate existing ParentJobId + new ParentExecutionId/RootExecutionId on ScheduledTrigger when dispatching child jobs. Backward compatible for root jobs.
acceptanceCriteria: Root jobs have all three as null (backward compatible)

userStories.title: Integration Tests
userStories.description: End-to-end hierarchy scenarios: chain, run conditions, depth limits, causation header propagation. Testcontainers + PostgreSQL.
acceptanceCriteria: Chain test: A→B→C with correct ParentExecutionId chain
Causation headers propagation through job→message→child chain

userStories.title: Configuration + Documentation
userStories.description: Add MaxJobDepth to SchedulingOptions. Document hierarchy features in README with examples.
acceptanceCriteria: README documents chaining API, causation headers
Code examples for common patterns (A→B chain, A→B on failure)
